name: CTRL FRK
description:
Experimental game about teamwork, creation and control.

I tried to communicate a message on the level of mechanics and interface.

Fullscreen is recommended.

«It’s the best explanation of collaboration issues I’ve ever seen»

Made in 48 hours for #LD40
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/ctrl-frk
